name: AxShowHideWidget
description: Toggles the visibility of an area upon receiving events.

name.description: Name of the exported area used to show or hide content.

show.description: Show the content area upon action request.

onActions.description: Actions on which the content should become visible.

hide.description: Hide the content are upon action request.

onActions.description: Actions on which the content should become invisible.

visibility.description: Allow to control area visibility based on flag state.

initially.description: Determines if the content area is visible initially (true) or not.

flag.description: Flag published on change of the content's visibility.

toggleOn.description: Flag toggling the content's visibility. The content is shown if true, hidden otherwise.

animation.description: Offer to animate changes to the visibility state.

enabled.description: If true visibility changes are animated.
